mapper.select: SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} AND content LIKE '%检验%' OR content LIKE '%检查%' ORDER BY record_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medical_records( patient_id, record_type, record_time, content, doctor_id, department ) VALUES ( #{patientId}, #{recordType}, #{recordTime}, #{content}, #{doctorId}, #{department} )
mapper.select: SELECT mr.* FROM medical_records mr JOIN patients p ON mr.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE mr.patient_id = #{patientId} AND mr.record_time BETWEEN p.admission_time AND COALESCE(p.discharge_time, NOW()) ORDER BY mr.record_time DESC
